channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Soldes smartphones : les marchands liquident les stocks de smartphones dont ceux d’iPhone Air pour la dernière démarque
item.description: La dernière démarque des soldes d'hiver est lancée ! Il ne reste donc plus qu'une semaine avant la fin des promotions programmée pour le 3 février. Il reste donc encore un peu de temps pour se décider sur le nouveau smartphone qu'on souhaiterait avoir en poche.

item.title: Perfect minimalism: I found 32 crisp white home office finds for a calming 'clean desk' aesthetic
item.description: Create an ocean of calm in your home office with all-white home-working tech and decor.

item.title: The best smart rings for tracking sleep and health
item.description: So, you’re thinking of buying a smart ring. Well, some good news. Picking the best of the lot is incredibly easy right now. The “bad” news is that, as far as trustworthiness and reliability, your choices are somewhat limited, as this is still a niche and emerging gadget category. Smart rings are in the middle […]

item.title: Le Tank X est un monstrueux smartphone avec une batterie XXL et… un projecteur
item.description: Au beau milieu de nulle part, on peut quand même avoir envie de profiter d'un film comme au cinéma. Le nouveau smartphone durci du constructeur 8849, le Tank X, est non seulement adapté aux environnements les plus hostiles, mais il intègre aussi… un projecteur.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra : admirez deux de ses coloris dans ces visuels très affinés
item.description: Une nouvelle fournée de visuels montrent le Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra dans deux coloris tout confirmant quelques caractéristiques.

item.title: Belkin’s Wemo smart devices will go offline on Saturday
item.description: As of Saturday, nearly all of Belkin's Wemo smart home devices will lose access to cloud services, including features like remote access and integrations with Google Home and Alexa. Belkin will also end app updates for the Wemo app beginning on January 31st. The shut down was first announced in July and impacts most Wemo […]

item.title: The first season of Amazon's Fallout show is now free on Youtube
item.description: Fallout’s second season is coming to a close, and it’s been well worth the wait. But if a reluctance to add yet another subscription to your streaming rotation means you haven’t watched Amazon’s surprisingly excellent adaptation yet, you might be interested to know that the company is currently releasing season one for free on the Prime Video YouTube channel. Whether driven by Amazon wanting even more people to watch what has become one of its biggest TV success stories, or a move that speaks to how few people are actually signed up for Prime Video, it’s good news for anyone who hasn’t seen th...

item.title: If GTA 6 gets delayed again, it may never live up to its hype – here's exactly why
item.description: Another delay for GTA 6 might leave fans losing interest in the game, and our recent poll indicates that.

item.title: The best robot vacuum and mop to buy right now
item.description: Robot vacuums that can both mop and sweep your floors have improved significantly in recent years. While they are still not as effective as good ol’ manual labor, if you run them regularly, they will help keep your floors cleaner with much less effort on your part. The difference is that newer “combo” robot vacuum-and-mop […]

item.title: Windscribe promises users in Iran and Russia "solutions" to ongoing VPN crackdown — here's everything we know
item.description: As Iran and Russia double down their VPN crackdown, Windscribe confirms it's working on solutions, with wider support for the AmneziaWG protocol being the "highest priority."

item.title: Redmi Note 15 Pro+ 5G : voici la marche à suivre exacte pour en profiter à prix plancher [Sponso]
item.description: À peine sorti, le Redmi Note 15 Pro+ 5G s'affiche déjà avec une belle offre de lancement chez SFR, accompagné d'un forfait 5G tout illimité.

item.title: Amazon discovered a 'high volume' of CSAM in its AI training data but isn't saying where it came from
item.description: The National Center for Missing and Exploited Children said it received more than 1 million reports of AI-related child sexual abuse material (CSAM) in 2025. The "vast majority" of that content was reported by Amazon, which found the material in its training data, according to an investigation by Bloomberg. In addition, Amazon said only that it obtained the inappropriate content from external sources used to train its AI services and claimed it could not provide any further details about where the CSAM came from. Amazon provided Engadget with the following statement to explain why it doesn’t h...

item.title: Hugging Face platform hijacked to send out Android malware - here's what we know so far
item.description: Popular AI platform Hugging Face is being used for Android malware which can take over compromised devices.

item.title: Owala Tattoos add a new layer of customization to our favorite emotional support FreeSip bottle
item.description: Owala Tattoos allow you to customize your water bottle with engraving, an artistic print, a full sleeve, or your own art. Customizations are $10 and are available for the viral Owala FreeSip bottle.

item.title: This 65-inch LG Mini LED 4K TV is the ultimate upgrade at over $400 off
item.description: The LG 65-inch QNED85A Mini LED 4K TV is on sale for just $796.99 at both Amazon and Best Buy. That's a savings of over $400.

item.title: Monarch Money deal: New users get one year of access for only $50
item.description: The start of the new year is a great time to get your finances in order, and a good budgeting app can help with that. Instead of laboring over a spreadsheet, you can try one of our favorite budgeting apps for less than usual. Monarch Money is running a sale that gives new users 50 percent off one year of the service, bringing the final cost down to just $50. Just use the code NEWYEAR2026 at checkout to get the discount. Monarch Money makes for a capable and detailed budgeting companion. You can use the service via apps for iOS, Android, iPadOS or the web, and Monarch also offers a Chrome exten...

item.title: The Films and Shows You Should Be Streaming in February 2026

item.title: After Minneapolis, Tech CEOs Are Struggling to Stay Silent
item.description: Silicon Valley’s power brokers spent the past year currying favor with President Trump. Two deadly shootings in Minneapolis are now exposing the price of that bargain.

item.title: Un amas géant, caché par la poussière, vient d’être découvert aux confins du cosmos et dérange les modèles actuels
item.description: Des astronomes ont poussé le radiotélescope le plus sensible du monde jusqu’à un record. Ils ont ainsi percé le voile d’une région du ciel pourtant déjà bien balayée par le télescope spatial Hubble. Ce qu’ils ont découvert alors que notre Univers n’avait qu’un milliard d’années défie toutes les...

item.title: Don Lemon has been arrested for covering an anti-ICE protest
item.description: Don Lemon, a former CNN anchor turned independent journalist, was arrested on Thursday night by federal agents in Los Angeles, who alleged that he had violated federal law while covering an anti-ICE protest in Minnesota. Notably, Lemon was not the only journalist targeted by law enforcement for their presence at the Minnesota protest. On Thursday […]...

item.title: Cold weather in Florida is pushing back the Artemis II launch
item.description: As a result of cold weather and windy conditions moving through Florida, NASA is now targeting Monday, February 2nd for a wet dress rehearsal of the Artemis II Space Launch System (SLS) rocket. Depending on how Monday's rehearsal goes, NASA will potentially set a launch date for Artemis II. But as a result of the […]

item.title: Miss Windows 10's movable taskbar? You still can't relocate it in Windows 11, but a new PowerToys feature could be the next best thing
item.description: PowerToys is a nifty suite of add-ons for Windows 11, and a potential new feature could be a welcome addition.

item.title: Former CNN anchor Don Lemon arrested by federal agents after covering an anti-ICE protest in Minnesota
item.description: Lemon’s attorney, Abbe Lowell, said the journalist was arrested by federal agents in Los Angeles. Journalist Don Lemon and three other people were arrested Friday in connection with an anti-immigration protest that disrupted a service at a Minnesota church and increased tensions between residents and the Trump administration, officials said.Lemon was arrested by federal agents in Los Angeles, where he had been covering the Grammy Awards, his attorney Abbe Lowell said. It is unclear what charge or charges Lemon and the others are facing in the Jan. 18 protest at the Cities Church in St. Paul. L...

item.title: De l’Apple Watch lifestyle à la smartwatch Garmin sportive, voici les meilleures offres des soldes d’hiver sur les montres connectées

Pour la dernière ligne droite des soldes d'hiver, voici les ultimes offres sur ces accessoires aussi sportifs que lifestyle.

item.title: Tesla throws in the towel on car sales
item.description: Is Tesla still a car company? It's a question we've been asking ourselves more frequently over the past year, especially as the company's car business shrinks and Elon Musk continues to push the message that Tesla should be seen more as an AI and robotics leader and less so as a mere seller of four-wheeled […]

item.title: « Les VPN, c’est le prochain sujet sur ma liste » : le gouvernement compte déclarer la guerre aux VPN
item.description: L'interdiction des réseaux sociaux aux moins de 15 ans vient d'être votée, mais la question du contournement technique se pose déjà. Lucide, la ministre Anne Le Hénanff prévient : la régulation des VPN est la prochaine bataille de l'exécutif.

item.description: Will killing dingoes on Australia’s K’gari Island make visitors safer? These experts say it’s unlikely.

item.title: Les Apple AirPods Pro 2 sont à leur meilleur prix pour la fin des soldes
item.description: Les AirPods Pro 2 incarnent l'ancienne vitrine du savoir-faire audio d'Apple, équipés de la puce H2 et d'une réduction toujours parmi les meilleures du marché. Pour le dernier week-end des soldes, leur prix tombe à 188 euros au lieu de 249 euros, grâce à une remise cumulée à un code promo chez Son-Vidéo.com.

item.title: Windows + barre des tâches façon macOS : l’arme secrète de Microsoft pour enfin rendre son OS sexy
item.description: Microsoft s’apprête à piquer le secret de macOS : une barre de menu universel ultra-personnalisable arrive dans Windows 11 via PowerToys ! Baptisé Command Palette Dock, ce concept modulable (fixable partout et bourré d’extensions) veut fluidifier votre quotidien et défier Apple sur son terrain. Reste à savoir si le nom « Dock » survivra aux débats qu'il risque de générer....

item.title: Même Apple n’y croit plus : la fin silencieuse de la 5G millimétrique en France
item.description: On nous l'avait vendue comme le « vrai » futur de la connectivité mobile, capable de débits hallucinants. Pourtant, la 5G millimétrique semble avoir totalement disparu des radars dans l'Hexagone. Entre des contraintes techniques rédhibitoires et des opérateurs frileux, cette technologie fait un flop monumental, au point que même Apple commence à retirer les composants nécessaires de ses iPhone. ...

item.title: Trump threatens Canada with a 50% tariff, escalating a trade war that could impact U.S. air travel
item.description: In a retaliatory move, Trump said any Canadian aircraft sold in the U.S. would be subject to a 50% tariff. President Donald Trump on Thursday threatened Canada with a 50% tariff on any aircraft sold in the U.S., the latest salvo in his trade war with America’s northern neighbor as his feud with Prime Minister Mark Carney expands.Trump’s threat posted on social media came after he threatened over the weekend to impose a 100% tariff on goods imported from Canada if it went forward with a planned trade deal with China. But Trump’s threat did not come with any details about when he would impose th...

item.title: How context-aware agents and open protocols drive real-world success in enterprise AI
item.description: As enterprises push AI into production, they're encountering a fundamental constraint: general-purpose models lack the real-time operational context that enterprise decisions require.

item.title: Super Bowl 2026 TV deals: The best sales on OLEDs and other smart TVs ahead of kickoff
item.description: Whether you’re having people over to watch the Patriots and the Seahawks battle it out in Super Bowl 2026, or you’re more interested in the Bad Bunny halftime show, your TV will be an important part of the puzzle of putting together an excellent big-game party. If you’ve been thinking about upgrading your current TV, now’s a decent time to do it. The weeks leading up to the Super Bowl are typically awash with TV deals to consider.Generally, TV prices steadily decrease after a new model comes out. Some 2026 TV models were announced at CES and are forthcoming things year, making now a good time ...

Grammy winner Bad Bunny, seen here accepting his award for Best Música Urbana Album for “Un Verano Sin Ti” in 2023, is nominated again this year. (Timothy Norris/FilmMagic)
Timothy Norris via Getty Images
The 2026 Grammy Awards honor music's biggest achievements of the year, and some of the biggest stars on the planet are nominated this year. Kendrick Lamar leads the way with nine nominations, including for Record and Song of the Year for "luther," his collaboration with SZA. Other top nominees this year include Lady Gaga, Jack Antonoff, and Cirkut with seven nominations apiece, a...

item.title: Why the Trump administration is watering down the definition of ‘doxxing’
item.description: There’s a big difference between sharing sensitive personal info and naming a public servant. Conflating the two is an impediment to accountability. Concept creep is literally problematic. It’s what happens when words like “problematic” and “literally” expand far beyond their original definitions, eventually becoming so diffuse as to no longer hold any real meaning....

item.title: Les meilleures tablettes tactiles n’échappent pas aux soldes d’hiver. Voici les 11 meilleurs bons plans de la dernière démarque

Boudés il n'y a pas si longtemps encore, ces appareils ont maintenant les faveurs des consommateurs, notamment pendant les soldes d'hiver.
